sqlMap.select: SELECT YEAR ,EVAL_USER_GRP_ID ,ITEM_GRP_ID ,ITEM_GRP_NM ,CONTENT ,EVAL_SUBMIT_YN ,EVAL_CLOSING_YN ,EVAL_SUBMIT_YN_NM ,TOT_CNT ,EVAL_CNT ,EVAL_CNT||'/'||TOT_CNT ALL_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.YEAR , A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID , C.ITEM_GRP_ID , C.ITEM_GRP_NM , C.CONTENT , NVL(D.EVAL_SUBMIT_YN, 'N') AS EVAL_SUBMIT_YN , B.EVAL_CLOSING_YN , F_CODE_NM('143', NVL(D.EVAL_SUBMIT_YN, 'N'), A.YEAR) AS EVAL_SUBMIT_YN_NM , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BSC_AHP_ITEM_TAB WHERE YEAR = A.YEAR AND ITEM_GRP_ID = C.ITEM_GRP_ID) AS TOT_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL WHERE YEAR = A.YEAR AND EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID AND ITEM_GRP_ID = C.ITEM_GRP_ID AND EVAL_USER_ID = #findEvalUserId# AND EVAL_SCORE_ID IS NOT NULL) AS EVAL_CNT FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_USER_GRP A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_AHP_EVAL_MAPPING B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = B.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID INNER JOIN BSC_AHP_ITEM_GRP C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.ITEM_GRP_ID = C.ITEM_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_AHP_EVAL_STATUS D ON A.YEAR = D.YEAR AND C.ITEM_GRP_ID = D.ITEM_GRP_ID AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = D.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID AND D.EVAL_USER_ID = #findEvalUserId# WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #findEvalUserGrpId# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER )
SELECT DISTINCT A.EVAL_USER_ID , B.USER_NM AS EVAL_USER_NM FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER B ON A.EVAL_USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY B.USER_NM ASC

SELECT A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID , A.EVAL_USER_GRP_NM FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_USER_GRP A WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID IN (SELECT EVAL_USER_GRP_ID FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_USER WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND EVAL_USER_ID = #findEvalUserId#) ORDER BY SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.YEAR , A.ITEM_ID , B.ITEM_NM , A.PER_ITEM_ID , C.ITEM_NM AS PER_ITEM_NM , D.EVAL_SCORE_ID , E.EVAL_SCORE FROM BSC_AHP_ITEM_TAB A INNER JOIN BSC_AHP_ITEM B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID INNER JOIN BSC_AHP_ITEM C ON A.YEAR = C.YEAR AND A.PER_ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_AHP_EVAL D ON A.YEAR = D.YEAR AND D.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId# AND D.EVAL_USER_ID = #evalUserId# AND B.ITEM_ID = D.ITEM_ID AND C.ITEM_ID = D.PER_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_AHP_EVAL_SCORE E ON D.YEAR = E.YEAR AND D.EVAL_SCORE_ID = E.EVAL_SCORE_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #year# AND A.ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId# ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER
SELECT EVAL_SCORE_ID , EVAL_SCORE , CONTENT FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_SCORE WHERE YEAR = #year# ORDER BY SORT_ORDER
sqlMap.update: DELETE FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL WHERE YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId# AND EVAL_USER_ID = #evalUserId# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BSC_AHP_EVAL ( YEAR , EVAL_USER_GRP_ID , EVAL_USER_ID , ITEM_ID , PER_ITEM_ID , ITEM_GRP_ID , EVAL_SCORE_ID , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #evalUserGrpId# , #evalUserId# , #itemId# , #perItemId# , #itemGrpId# , #evalScoreId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.select: SELECT YEAR , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(START_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS START_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS END_DT , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR( SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN START_DT AND END_DT THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EVAL_TERM_YN FROM BSC_AHP_IN_TERM WHERE YEAR = #findYear#
SELECT USER_NM AS EVAL_USER_NM FROM BSC_USERINFO WHERE USER_ID = #evalUserId#
SELECT ITEM_GRP_NM FROM BSC_AHP_ITEM_GRP WHERE YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId#
SELECT EVAL_USER_GRP_NM FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_USER_GRP WHERE YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId#

SELECT NVL(MAX(EVAL_SUBMIT_YN), 'N') AS EVAL_SUBMIT_YN , F_CODE_NM('143', NVL(MAX(EVAL_SUBMIT_YN), 'N'), MAX(YEAR)) AS EVAL_SUBMIT_YN_NM FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_STATUS WHERE YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId# AND EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId# AND EVAL_USER_ID = #evalUserId#
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM BSC_AHP_EVAL_STATUS WHERE YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId# AND EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId# AND EVAL_USER_ID = #evalUserId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BSC_AHP_EVAL_STATUS ( YEAR , ITEM_GRP_ID , EVAL_USER_GRP_ID , EVAL_USER_ID , EVAL_SUBMIT_YN , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #itemGrpId# , #evalUserGrpId# , #evalUserId# , #evalSubmitYn# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BSC_AHP_EVAL_STATUS SET EVAL_SUBMIT_YN = #evalSubmitYn# , MODIFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId# AND EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId# AND EVAL_USER_ID = #evalUserId#
